name: RetroHOT
description:
SUPERHOT and Wolfstein 3D love-child.

Enter a strange reality. Find yourself. Get RETRO.

Keeping SUPERHOT main mechanic, time stops when you stop.
Navigate a maze of retroscapes, unlock new paths, survive the one-hit kills.

Controls:

WASD - Move around.
Left/Right - Look around.
Shift - Run
Up/Space - Shoot
Tab - Mini-Map
Escape - Exit

Gamepads are also supported.
